message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll sell it to you for $92.50.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to meet me at $87.50?
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $87.50. I'll try to meet you halfway again, so I'll sell it to you for $93.75.
I'm still not comfortable with the price, but I'm willing to compromise. Can you try to meet me at $90?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $90. I'll try to meet you halfway again, so I'll sell it to you for $95.
I'm getting close to giving up, but I really want this product. Can you try to meet me at $92?
I'm not willing to go as low as $92, but I'll try to meet you halfway again. I'll sell it to you for $97.50.
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll make one last offer. Can you meet me at $94?
